views.markdown:
Make your cydia homepage usefull again fill it with live updated jailbreaking and apple news ranging  from 3 news sources. Feel freeas running this news parsing server costs money. Updates comming soon.

Configure options from Settings.

- Animated loading screen - made better preffs - better logo for Uitab - option to disable the fancy cydia loading animation
- wishdia support ( you can use wishdia and libellus alongside eachother) ! make sure to enable in settings


- Allowed for a smoother browsing expierence - Removed bugs to improve load times - edited prefferences
